bv2:69.6: upaṭṭhissatimaṃ → upaṭṭhissati taṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | taṃ upaṭṭhissati (pts-vp-pli1ed)
bv2:78.2: Padakkhiṇamakaṃsu → sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṃsu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
bv2:81.4: abhiññāsu pāramiṅgato → abhiññāpāramiṃ gato (bj) | abhiññāpāramiṅgato (sya1ed, sya2ed)
bv2:181.3: bhavantvantarāyā → bhavatvantarāyo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | bhavantvantarāyo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
bv2:190.1: Sumedhapatthanākathā → sumedhakathā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | sumedhavatthukathā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
